snippet: A test batch of small stuffed toys called Tsum Tsum, already a hit in Japan, has sold out in Disney Stores in the United States, and the company wonders if it has found the next Beanie Baby.
abstract: Test batch of small stuffed toys called Tsum Tsum, already a hit in Japan, has sold out in some Disney Stores in the United States, and the company wonders if it has found the next Beanie Baby; Disney is rushing to restock and expand line to all of its stores.
lead_paragraph: A test batch of small stuffed toys called Tsum Tsum, already a hit in Japan, has sold out in Disney Stores in the United States, and the company wonders if it has found the next Beanie Baby.

headline.main: Sensing a Tsum Tsum Craze Afoot, Disney Rushes to Supply Fans
headline.print_headline: Sensing a Tsum Tsum Craze Afoot, Disney Rushes to Supply Fans
